s: I came across Jovinno from an Ad I came across on Instagram. I've been looking for a natural pomade and decided to give it a shot, and it's defiantly what I've been looking for I like a lot of volume on my hair, and it gave me that volume I like. The metal hairstyling comb was a plus its unique wide tooth gives you a natural texture without the need of running your fingers through. Love this brand...
